content:
Hello everyone and welcome to San Antonio! We can use this topic for general Connectathon discussions this weekend.

After the Connectathon kick-off, we'll do a brief round of introductions at our tables to set the stage for this weekend.
Also, for those of you at the Connectathon, please add your name to our participant tracking sheet here: https://bit.ly/cds-hooks-connectathon-tracking
Congrats to the First Databank crew for taking the top honors this year for the most attendees (5!) from a single org at the CDS Hooks track! :tada:
For those interested, we have started another CDS Hooks table...but this one is in the hotel bar so we can work while watching the Chiefs + Colts game :american_football:
I am at the genomics table but working on cds-hooks. I just added our hooks discovery endpoint to the spreadsheet if you want to try it out.

Good morning everyone!

Today we have a breakout session at 11am in the Live Oak room. Topics for our breakout session:
- 1.0 publication update
- Connectathon feedback on the spec (eg, #458)
- Hook management process
- 1.1 plans (including a demo of Decisions in the CDS Hooks Sandbox)

If anyone has any other topics that are interested in discussing, please speak up here or stop over to chat.

Reminder - we have our breakout session in 10 minutes (11am) in the Live Oak room (1 floor above us). I've scoped out the room and the quickest way there is to take the stairs near the bathrooms. You can find the stairs / bathroom by walking out of the ballroom and walking straight (past where breakfast was). You'll run right into the bathrooms & stairs.
